title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 21 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 21 2022
description:
It's the one-year anniversary of C&B! Clay says, "Thank you to everyone out there who has given us the chance to step into the biggest legacy in the history of radio... and we hope that we have done a good job continuing to advance the fight for the things that Rush would have been fighting for himself." New evidence affirms there was an abject, inexcusable police failure in Uvalde. Glenn Beck, Jesse Kelly, Bill O'Reilly wish C&B a happy anniversary. Football great Herschel Walker joins Clay and Buck to respond to leftist media attacks on him and talk about his run for Senate in Georgia. Sean Hannity says happy anniversary to Clay and Buck. C&B take calls from law enforcement on Uvalde.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
